Blog.post: Rant Number 2 Second day of school Oy, now we start actual keyboardingâ¦what great joy! **coughcough** I really suck at normal keyboardingâ¦It definitely isnât one of my strong points. Well this is really boringâ¦ These keyboarding books look cool thoâ¦ they are more like notepads for learning how to keyboard correctly. I remember learning this in sixth grade with Mr. Donovanâ¦ he was nice, but the class sucked. **15 minutes later** OMG Iâm going to kill myself because this is so much different from my normal style of typing that its driving me crazy!
